stem_statement: General
Knowledge of the physical connections and/or cause and effect relationships between the (SYSTEM) and the following systems
Knowledge of electrical power supplies to the following
Knowledge of the effect that a loss or malfunction of the (SYSTEM) will have on the following systems or system parameters
Knowledge of (SYSTEM) design features and/or interlocks that provide for the following
Knowledge of the operational implications or cause and effect relationships of the following concepts as they apply to the (SYSTEM)
Knowledge of the effect of the following plant conditions, system malfunctions, or component malfunctions on the (SYSTEM)
Ability to predict and/or monitor changes in parameters associated with operation of the (SYSTEM), including
Ability to (a) predict the impacts of the following on the (SYSTEM) and (b) based on those predictions, use procedures to correct, control, or mitigate the consequences of those abnormal operations
Ability to monitor automatic features of the (SYSTEM), including
Ability to manually operate and/or monitor the (SYSTEM) in the control room
